instructions:
Remove skin from chicken pieces and coat with the combined flour and salt. In a Dutch oven brown
chicken in hot oil over medium/high heat turning frequently, about 12 minutes. Reduce heat. Add tomatoes,
mushrooms, onion, green pepper, parboiled carrots, sugar, garlic, bay leaf, parsley, thyme, marjoram and
bouillon. Cover and simmer over low heat about 20 minutes. Mix cornstarch with 3 tbsp of wine and add
with remaining wine. Simmer uncovered 30 minutes to reduce liquid. Serve over noodles. Serves 6. 
*(Rev.
2/22/94)*
ingredients: 2 cans (14 oz ea) Italian style tomatoes, cut up
1 large onion (Spanish or Vadalia) 1/4 inch sliced and quartered
1 green pepper, 1/2 inch sliced and halved
4 to 6 carrots, 3 inch chunks parboiled for 5 minutes
name: Hunter's Style Chicken
creator: Mary & Jim Decker
